Worcester.Alexander Marsh House:
The Alexander Marsh House is an historic house located at 57 Elm Street in Worcester, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The 1-1/2 story Greek Revival cottage was built in 1848 by Levi Lincoln, Jr., and is a well-preserved and relatively unaltered instance of what was then a widely popular form. The house has a typical side hall plan, with an entry framed by sidelight windows, with full-length windows to the entry's right.
